purpose: Durham University is hiring a Research Associate / Postdoctoral Research Assistant for Platform Software Engineering for the Project JusTN0W.
evidence_sentences: Durham University Computer Science is Hiring a Research Associate / Postdoctoral Research Assistant for Platform Software Engineering for the Project JusTN0W.
You will contribute to developing a framework and software prototype for an AI-based compliance control system.

Working closely with the Principal Investigators (PIs) and Co-Investigators (Co-Is) of JusTN0W, you will contribute to the development of a framework and software prototype for an AI-based compliance control system.
